# isPopoverVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the popover is currently visible.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isPopoverVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You must present the popover to make it visible.

## Getting the popover attributes

- **arrowDirection**: The direction of the popover’s arrow.

items.description: The direction of the popover’s arrow.
